channel.title: Need help on how to catch those auto clickers
channel.description:
On my server...To train. you must click on things (dummies etc. / Like most server) But alot of people auto click, is there any way to catch them?
Example, if a person clicks 10 times and in between is always the EXACT same time...and theres a patern, it would insert it somwhere in logs? I don't know.
~Park ~Thanks if you tried helping

item.title: Need help on how to catch those auto clickers
item.dc:creator: @Sparky_gp Sparky_gp
item.description:
@Sparky_gp wrote:

Yea. I knew something about that but he would have to know how to code…oh well. Thanks for helping him.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on how to catch those auto clickers

item.title: Need help on how to catch those auto clickers
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Well, something along the lines of:

case ####:
}
YOUR CASE SHIT
{
clicks();
sendMessage("Masser/Autoer... autoing logged!");
break;

The a void…

public void clicks {
SOMETHING TO DO WITH CLICKS IN A FEW SECS.
}
PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
appendToBanned(victim);
{
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("auto.txt", true));
bw.write("Caught autoing: "+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();

And make a txt file called auto…
But this won’t work, freehanded it.

item.title: Need help on how to catch those auto clickers

item.description:
@Sparky_gp wrote:

I am pretty sure there is no way to catch them. You could try PM’ing Mopar about this. But I have tried and everything I code ends up not working.

~Sparky_gp
